items.preText: Afghanistan have crossed 100 at the halfway mark
items.text: comes down the track and he's missed it completely! It was flighted generously just outside off on good length, Asghar was tempted and he came down, drove the wrong line and the ball went in as a natural variation to knock the top of off and middle stumps
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, OUT

dismissal.text: Asghar Afghan  b Shakib Al Hasan 8 (16b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

items.text: gets a full delivery first up and drives it down to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: he waits for the slow delivery on off and then defends it back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: more on middle stump this time, he goes back and tucks it to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: angled in towards middle, no room, he blocks it back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: similar delivery on middle stump, pushed into the covers this time
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: flighted just outside off, Shahidi moves towards the ball and sweeps it against the turn in the gap on the leg side for four
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: hardly any room on off this time, he cuts it to backward point
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: coming in towards the stumps from outside off, driven into the covers
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: more towards middle, he flicks it to the leg side against the turn. He wants two but is sent back immediately by Shenwari
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: turning in a bit, he helps it to midwicket with the turn
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: big back lift for the straighter delivery, he takes out a big sweep and gets only one to long leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: angling in, he goes back and nudges the ball behind square and sneaks in a quick single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: pitched up on off, he helps it down to long on for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: a bit of fumble at cover after it's punched off the back foot and they get one more
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: dabs it wide of cover in the gap and they get one more
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: flighted on leg, flicked towards deep midwicket for an easy single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: lets the ball turn from middle to leg and he nudges it for one to end the over
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText: 27 runs off the last five, Afghanistan's run rate has crossed four per over
items.text: cuts off the back foot, some time for deep point to collect and the throw is very accurate but Shahidi comes back quickly and dives to make it back in time
items.postText: Shahidi landed on the right side of his chest and is lying on the ground. He's getting some treatment
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 2 runs

items.text: hint of room on the off side, cuts off the back foot again. Single this time
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: pokes his bat out cheekily and it's gone fine on the off side for two
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Samiullah Shinwari, 2 runs

items.text: goes straight after pitching on length outside off, he leans forward for the drive and misses it
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: more on the stumps now, he goes back and pushes it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven away past cover for one
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: angled in sharply towards leg, worked away but can't go past midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run
